-[Project 1](/Project1)
Super Smash Bros Ultimate is a video game containing a wide range of characters from the Nintendo franchise. Data was extracted and wrangled in order to perform an exploratory analysis of the best character to choose from. 

-[Project 2](/Project2)
The Pokemon series contains a large database about each monster and offers character statistics of every single one of them. With the dataset studied, we were able to model and set predictions in order to find the best statistics between each Pokemon and their type.
